name: Add a new contact from a submitted Ontraport form to Google Sheets
description:
Every time a contact is created in Ontraport using an Ontraport form, Make will automatically add the contact to your Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The template uses this [Ontraport form](https://danielb.ontralink.email/f/1/229120/1/e825c63e7c702c445203968635c6bce4) and this [Google Sheets spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fRnSB9WMVmIvWMHoFcHWcWJuViCl6TLtPc7oinvSQ94/edit?usp=sharing).
